question: What items will you lose when starting New Game + in The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt?
answer: When starting New Game + in The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt, you will lose quest items (except for some minor ones), books, Gwent cards (except for the basic Northern Realms deck), crafting diagrams, alchemy formulas, trophies, map exploration data, bestiary entries, and character entries. Additionally, any retained items will not be available during the tutorial sections.
